title: 求告知askyblock空岛插件给玩家的权限是神马意思
author: skin_zcg
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skin_zcg 于 2020-5-30 15:29 编辑 

如标题。求告知askyblock空岛插件的权限是神马意思
askyblock.island.*
askyblock.team.create
askyblock.team.kick
askyblock.team.makeleader
askyblock.team.join
askyblock.intopten
askyblock.island.controlpanel

replies.author: ZeroSheep
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ZeroSheep 于 2020-5-30 15:48 编辑 

权限节点
   原帖描述
  中文翻译


askyblock.island.* 
  所有基础权限

askyblock.team.create
  Let a player invite other players to join a team
  创建队伍

askyblock.team.kick
  Let a player kick other players
  踢出队伍里的玩家

askyblock.team.makeleader
  Let a player make another player leader of the team
  让玩家成为该队伍的队长

askyblock.team.join  
  Let a player join another player's team
  允许玩家加入其他人的队伍

askyblock.intopten
  Includes player in top ten
  [?] 纳入前十排名统计

askyblock.island.controlpanel
   Allows usage of the island GUI
  打开GUI菜单权限
